translation.en: Welcome to the Lucky Strike program.
Welcome back to the world of the living.
-[indistinct PA announcement] -So?
[echoing] Good morning, Tessa. I'm Dr. Sarkisian.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 泰莎 我是萨基希安医生

translation.en: You've been in a very bad car accident.
You ruptured your heart due to trauma,
which we were forced to repair surgically.
Tessa?
Morning.
-Morning. -I made pancakes.
Oh, I'm sorry. I'm gonna go shoot photos.
translation.zh: ‎哦 抱歉 我要去拍照片

translation.en: Oh, it's so cold outside.
Yeah, I just don't want to miss the morning light.
Well, maybe when you're back, we could do a little research for colleges.
translation.zh: ‎要么等你回来 ‎我们一起研究一下报考哪所大学

translation.en: All right. Bye.
She hides behind that camera.
She's not taken a single picture of us.
translation.zh: ‎她从来没有给我们拍过照片

translation.en: You're too pretty. You'd break her lens.
translation.zh: ‎你太漂亮了 会靓瞎她的镜头

translation.en: Hey, I told you. You've gotta let her come to you.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉过你 你得让她主动接近你

translation.en: It's been a year.
Signing a piece of paper doesn't make us her parents.
translation.zh: ‎签个文件并不代表我们是她的父母

translation.en: Actually it does.
♪ Teenage headache dreams ♪
translation.zh: ‎（浪漫二月《巴黎野玫瑰》） ‎（《尼基塔》）

translation.en: You open, Sherman? I am for you, Tessa.
translation.zh:
‎-你们开门了吗 薛曼？
‎-你来就开门了 泰莎

translation.en: Um, I think I'm a little short.
That's no crime. I'm only 5'6".
translation.zh: ‎我觉得还差一点 ‎这又不是什么罪过 我才1米68

translation.en: Enjoy the show.
Sherman, where are the subtitles?
You watch. I'll translate.
"It's the first time we've met in daylight."
translation.zh: ‎这是我们第一次在白天见面

translation.en: "But you're very early."
I think I'm just gonna go tell the theater owner.
translation.zh: ‎我还是去跟影院老板说一下

translation.en: I mean, there's nothing he can do about it. They obviously sent him the wrong print.
translation.zh:
‎其实你什么都做不了
‎很明显他们送错了拷贝

translation.en: I can get my money back.
I've seen this film before. I don't think you want to miss it.
translation.zh:
‎我看过这部电影
‎我觉得你不想错过的

translation.en: Does it have a happy ending?
No. Definitely not.
Okay. Then I'll stay.
"You gonna eat all that chili yourself?"
translation.zh: ‎你要一个人吃掉所有的辣椒？

translation.en: "In this heat, you're mad."
"I eat chili no matter how hot it is, Betty."
translation.zh: ‎不管多热我都要吃这个辣椒 贝蒂

translation.en: -[both speaking French] -"Those bastards." "What?"
"Never mind. Kiss me."
"Those bastards. How could they do this to you?"
translation.zh: ‎那些混蛋 他们怎么能这样对我？

translation.en: I'm sorry. How long was I doing that?
translation.zh: ‎对不起 ‎我抓着你的手多久了？

translation.en: I lost feeling about an hour ago, so I'm not sure.
translation.zh:
‎一小时前我的手就麻了
‎所以我不确定 ‎你为什么不说？

translation.en: -Why didn't you say something? -Um, the movie is a bit of a downer, so…
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不说？ ‎这部电影有点伤感 所以…

translation.en: It's a love story. [sniffles]
I mean, not all love stories are downers.
translation.zh: ‎不是所以的爱情故事都伤感

translation.en: All the good ones are.
Romeo and Juliet, Anna Karenina,
translation.zh: ‎《罗密欧与朱丽叶》 ‎《安娜·卡列尼娜》、《英国病人》

translation.en: -The English Patient. -Mm-hmm.
I think it's the ending of a relationship,
that's what makes a love story so memorable.
translation.zh: ‎是爱情故事让人难忘的原因

translation.en: What about Pride and Prejudice?
Jane Eyre? Those both have happy endings.
translation.zh: ‎那《傲慢与偏见》呢？《简爱》？ ‎都是大团圆结局

translation.en: That's only because the writer chose to end their love stories prematurely.
translation.zh:
‎那只是因为作家选择
‎早早结束他们的爱情故事

translation.en: Wow. That is a really interesting way
of not admitting you're wrong.
Come on! Okay. Picture this.
translation.zh: ‎少来了 好吧 想想这样

translation.en: Picture that Leonardo DiCaprio didn't die at the end of Titanic.
translation.zh:
‎想象一下莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥
‎在《泰坦尼克号》结尾没有死

translation.en: -Do I have to? Oof. -You have to.
Jack Dawson is a jobless, penniless gambler,
translation.zh:
‎杰克·道森是个
‎无业又身无分文的赌徒

translation.en: who possessed, at best, marginal artistic talent.
translation.zh: ‎只有 最多 那么一点点艺术才能

translation.en: -He saved Rose's life. -Right, of course.
translation.zh:
‎他救了萝丝的命 ‎对 当然
‎但他还对萝丝展开了爱情攻势

translation.en: But he also love-bombed her and stole her away from her fiancé.
translation.zh:
‎对 当然
‎但他还对萝丝展开了爱情攻势 ‎把她从未婚夫那里抢走

translation.en: And poor Rose was just so hypnotized by that steamy car sex
translation.zh: ‎那次激情车震让可怜的萝丝鬼迷心窍

translation.en: that she really thought that he'd give her a life of passionate adventure?
translation.zh: ‎她真的以为 ‎杰克会让她过上充满激情的冒险生活

translation.en: Please, come on. That's a life of abject poverty and dehumanizing infidelity.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 少来了 ‎那是一种非常贫苦 ‎没有人性的通奸生活

translation.en: Titanic 2. If you thought part one was a disaster…
translation.zh:
‎《泰坦尼克号2》
‎如果你觉得第一部是灾难…

translation.en: Oh, my gosh.
-I-- -[Sherman] Time to go!
Jesus, this guy is getting a one-star review, for sure.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 我肯定要给这家伙一星差评

translation.en: So, um, how did you get so good at speaking French?
My dad is a foreign languages professor.
So by the time I was 12, he had me fluent in French, Spanish and Italian.
translation.zh:
‎所以我12岁的时候 ‎他已经让我可以流利地说
‎法语、西班牙语和意大利语了

translation.en: Oh! Oh, my gosh.
If I could just read Dante's Inferno in the original Italian,
translation.zh:
‎如果我能读懂
‎意大利原文的但丁《地狱》

translation.en: -my life would be complete, I think. -I get that a lot.
translation.zh:
‎那我的生活就圆满了 ‎-经常有人这么对我说
‎-真的？

translation.en: -Really? -No. No, I've never gotten that before.
translation.zh: ‎不 从来没人这么对我说过

translation.en: That's some pretty old gear you got there. You don't shoot digital?
translation.zh:
‎你的装备都旧了
‎你不用数码照相机吗？

translation.en: No, I don't. I get a much higher dynamic range on film.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我不用
‎用胶卷拍能得到更高的动态范围

translation.en: Plus, I'm also kind of addicted to the smell of the developing chemicals.
translation.zh:
‎而且我对
‎冲印化学药水的气味也很上瘾

translation.en: The fumes make me a little delirious. [laughs]
Kind of like what your eyes are doing to me right now.
translation.zh: ‎就像你的眼睛现在看着我的反应

translation.en: Ooh.
That…
-That was really cheesy. -No, no.
translation.zh: ‎那真是太土了 ‎不会的 就是

translation.en: It was… It was…
a little cheesy, yeah.
It sounded perfect in my head.
Oh, okay. Then let me imagine that for a sec, okay.
-Still bad? -It's worse, actually.
Somehow, I don't know.
Um, I should probably… Yeah, me too.
Um, thank you for letting me
whisper in your ear for three hours.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你让我在三个小时内 ‎对着你的耳朵窃窃私语

translation.en: You are welcome.
-Skylar. -What?
My name is… It's Skylar.
I'm Tessa.
Maybe I'll see you here again sometime.
translation.zh: ‎也许下次还能在这里见到你

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like that.
Oh! My jacket.
Sky. You're alive!
Come on. I want to show you something.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我想给你看样东西

translation.en: Sky!
Bad dream.
You called out his name.
It's called a visitation dream. We see lots of 'em around here.
translation.zh: ‎这叫做托梦 ‎在这里经常发生

translation.en: It's all part of the grieving process.
I know. It just felt like Skylar was really here.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 感觉像斯凯勒在这里

translation.en: -Doris would love to hear about that. -Who's Doris?
translation.zh: ‎我打赌桃乐丝一定很想听听 ‎桃乐丝是谁？

translation.en: A patient writing a book on the afterlife.
translation.zh: ‎一位病人 写了关于来世的书

translation.en: Okay.
The other day, she offered to read my aura.
translation.zh: ‎有一天她说要解析我的灵气

translation.en: I politely declined.
-What is that? -Your belongings from the crash.
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么？
‎-你的物品 车祸现场找到的

translation.en: They closed the accident report already?
Well, neither driver had drugs or alcohol in their system.
That's usually the end of it.
They never even interviewed me.
You said you didn't remember anything about the accident?
translation.zh: ‎你说过车祸的事情你完全不记得了？

translation.en: -I don't. -Maybe that's for the best.
[Dr. Sarkisian] I'm very encouraged, Tessa.
The scan shows your right ventricle is functioning quite well, despite the tear.
translation.zh:
‎尽管有撕裂
‎扫描显示你的右心室功能正常

translation.en: Finally, some good news.
It is more than good.
Ninety-nine out of 100 with this same injury die on my table.
translation.zh:
‎受过这种伤的人
‎有99%死在了我的桌子上

translation.en: I did die.
Only for a short time.
I could see Skylar.
Like, he was in this… this crazy white light.
What is that? Was she, you know, hallucinating?
translation.zh: ‎那是怎么回事？她出现幻觉了吗？

translation.en: When the body undergoes severe trauma…
-[heartbeat thumping] -…the hypothalamus can flood the brain
translation.zh: ‎下丘脑可以让大脑充满止痛的内啡肽

translation.en: -with pain-relieving endorphins. -[Vickie] So when can we take her home?
translation.zh:
‎下丘脑可以让大脑充满止痛的内啡肽 ‎-我们什么时候能带她回家？
‎-本周末

translation.en: [Dr. Sarkisian] End of the week.
translation.zh:
‎-我们什么时候能带她回家？
‎-本周末

translation.en: Tessa needs to be extremely careful these next few months.
translation.zh: ‎接下来的几个月泰莎需要非常小心

translation.en: Any chest pains or shortness of breath,
translation.zh:
‎有任何胸痛或呼吸急促症状
‎马上拨打急救电话

translation.en: you call 911 immediately. Understand?
translation.zh:
‎有任何胸痛或呼吸急促症状
‎马上拨打急救电话 ‎明白吗？

translation.en: Jazz? Just give me a second.
Jazz?
[Skylar] You watch, I'll translate.
[PA announcement] X-ray tech to ICU. Any available X-ray tech to ICU.
translation.zh:
‎X光技师至重症监护室
‎我们需要X光技师至重症监护室

translation.en: Hi, excuse me. Are you Doris?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 不好意思 ‎你是桃丽丝吗？

translation.en: [exhales] I am going to take a wild guess here.
translation.zh: ‎等等 让我先大胆猜测一下

translation.en: Room B424, girl with the broken heart?
[laughing] Relax.
I'm not psychic. Jasmine told me you might come looking for me.
translation.zh: ‎我不是灵媒 ‎贾丝敏说你可能会来找我

translation.en: Oh.
My condolences.
Thank you.
Are your hands injured?
Excuse me?
From the accident. Did you hurt your hands at all?
translation.zh:
‎车祸造成的？ ‎-你的手受伤了吗？
‎-没有 为什么这么问？

translation.en: -No, why? -Ta-da! Huh?
translation.zh:
‎-你的手受伤了吗？
‎-没有 为什么这么问？

translation.en: Oh, come on. Come on. [chuckles]
So, what is your book about?
It's about ADC's.
After Death Communication.
Okay, so you believe that dead people can contact us?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 所以你相信死人能联系我们？

translation.en: Along with billions of other peoples
from faiths that span the globe.
Sometimes, the departed,
they call out to us in voice.
And other times, we can smell their cologne or perfume in the air.
translation.zh: ‎有时候我们能在空气中闻到他们的 ‎香水味

translation.en: No matter how they communicate, the message is the same.
translation.zh: ‎不管他们怎么沟通 ‎传递的都是同一个信息

translation.en: "I'm still here."
"And your grief, like a beacon, calls me to your side."
translation.zh: ‎“你的悲伤 ‎就像灯塔 召唤我到你身边”

translation.en: And when the separation has been traumatic,
like with you and your boyfriend,
there's often unfinished business.
Like regrets or something?
Like things left undone or unsaid.
translation.zh: ‎比如有事情没做完 ‎或者有话没说出口

translation.en: -[door opens] -[Vickie] Tessa. We signed you out. It's time to go.
translation.zh: ‎泰莎 出院证明我签过字了 该走了

translation.en: He's in the in-between.
translation.zh:
‎他正处在生死之间
‎但不会在那里待太久

translation.en: But he won't be there for long, a few weeks at most.
translation.zh:
‎他正处在生死之间
‎但不会在那里待太久 ‎最多几个星期 等他再往前走

translation.en: And when he moves on…
translation.zh: ‎最多几个星期 等他再往前走

translation.en: he's gone for good.
-I gotta go. -Oh, wait, wait.
Here, take this. It's my first book.
translation.zh: ‎带上这个 这是我的第一本书

translation.en: -It's a good place to start. -That's okay.
translation.zh:
‎-用这本书入门很不错
‎-不用了

translation.en: He's reaching out to you.
Reach back.
It's too late for that.
[teacher] Tessa, you're up.
Um, this is a photo that I took back in February.
translation.zh: ‎这是我二月拍摄的一张照片

translation.en: Is that how you spend your free time, taking pictures of trees?
translation.zh:
‎你就是这样消磨时间吗？
‎拍树的照片？

translation.en: Well, it's actually not a tree, asshole.
-[class laughs] -It's a cell phone tower, disguised as a tree.
translation.zh: ‎这是一座伪装成树的手机信号塔

translation.en: It is an allegory for the artificiality of modern life.
It's a lovely photo, Tessa.
translation.zh: ‎那张照片拍得很好 泰莎

translation.en: Your technical skills have taken huge leaps this year.
translation.zh: ‎今年你的摄影水平有了很大提高

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
I know you're still a junior, but I think you have a good shot of getting into the Rhode Island School of Design.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你还是大三
‎但你可以考上罗德岛设计学院

translation.en: I'd be happy to write you a letter of recommendation.
Thank you. I just-- My work's not ready for that yet.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 要申请那所学校
‎我的作品还没准备好

translation.en: Oh? What do you feel is missing?
Just like a point of view. You know, something to say that's my own.
translation.zh: ‎一种观点 我自己的想法

translation.en: Well, maybe it's time for your subject matter to evolve.
translation.zh: ‎也许是时候深化一下你的主题

translation.en: After all, there is something notably missing from all your photos.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟你所有的照片都明显缺了点东西

translation.en: Yeah, I know. Color.
No. People.
You know, Tessa, before an artist can find her voice, she has to find a subject she loves.
translation.zh:
‎在艺术家表达自己的观点之前
‎她必须找到自己热爱的主题

translation.en: Who or what do you love, Tessa?
[Skylar] I should probably… Yeah, me too.
♪ Let's get older tonight ♪
translation.zh:
‎（疯狂三月！
‎《惊魂记》、《致命诱惑》） ‎（愚人四月！
‎《空前绝后满天飞》） ‎（《反斗智多星》）

translation.en: Hey, okay. What do you think?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 好的 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Red? -Noisy colors are trendy.
I don't know. I feel like you're kind of taking advantage of your dad's niceness.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 ‎我觉得你是在利用你爸的善良

translation.en: Of course, I am. My dad is putty when I get straight A's.
translation.zh:
‎我当然在利用他
‎只要我成绩全优 他愿意做任何事

translation.en: Hey, yo, Tess!
-Hi, Cortez. -Hey, uh, do you have plans this weekend?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 柯蒂斯 ‎这个周末有安排吗？

translation.en: As it happens, I actually work as Tessa's full-time scheduler,
translation.zh: ‎真巧 我是泰丝的全职日程安排员

translation.en: so I can say, with absolute authority,
that she does not have any plans this weekend.
What are you saying? What are you doing?
Well, the final crew meet of the season is this Saturday.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 本赛季最后一场赛艇比赛
‎在周六举行

translation.en: I was kind of wondering if you'd come out and take some photos.
Uh, sorry. I don't really do sports photography.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我不拍体育类的照片

translation.en: But if you glue a selfie stick to your forehead, it might be the same thing.
translation.zh:
‎如果你把自拍棒粘在额头上
‎效果可能也一样

translation.en: Will Judd be there?
Well, wherever I go, my rowing partner goes, so…
translation.zh: ‎我去哪里 我的赛艇搭档就去哪里 ‎所以…

translation.en: Then we'll be there.
"We" will be there?
I'll be there as your photo assistant, remember? I'm her photo assistant.
translation.zh:
‎我会去当你的助理
‎记得吗？我是她的摄影助理

translation.en: Well, the first race starts at 6:30.
In the morning? He didn't mean morning, did he?
[Tessa] Yup, he did.
Do you think Judd can see me from here?
-Hey! -You are fired. Give me this.
Assistanting is not my thing. My bad.
translation.zh: ‎我不擅长做助理 我的错

translation.en: You were the one who dragged me out here. So behave, please.
translation.zh: ‎是你把我拖来的 所以请礼貌一点

translation.en: Ready your marks.
Row!
They're pulling ahead!
-Whoo! Whoo! -Yeah!
-[both laughing] -Yes!
[Shannon] You never said he was hot.
-Yes, I did. -No, you said he was cute.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我说过
‎-你没有 ‎你说过他很可爱

translation.en: Emojis are cute. That guy is like melting my sunglasses, Tess.
translation.zh: ‎表情符号很可爱 ‎那家伙 ‎把我的太阳镜都融化了 泰丝

translation.en: -I think I'm gonna go. -Are you crazy?
You've been obsessed about this guy for like months, and you're just gonna ditch?
translation.zh: ‎你迷恋这家伙好几个月了 ‎你却要溜了

translation.en: -I don't know what to say to him. -"Hold me."
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道跟他说什么
‎-不会吧？

translation.en: He just won the race. Congratulate him.
translation.zh: ‎他刚刚赢了比赛 恭喜他

translation.en: Okay.
Can I put this on my Story? If you wanna die.
translation.zh:
‎-我能把这个发到社交网站上吗？
‎-除非你想死

translation.en: Tessa! Hey-- Oh!
-Oh, my God! Sorry. -Whoa, whoa!
translation.zh:
‎-哇
‎-哦 我的天 ‎抱歉 我的…

translation.en: My legs are always Jell-O after races.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我的… ‎我的腿比赛后总是会软

translation.en: I can't believe that you're a…
A jock?
A jock, yeah!
Jocks don't speak Spanish, French and Italian.
translation.zh:
‎运动健将不会说
‎西班牙语、法语和意大利语

translation.en: -Hey, this one does. -Well, they definitely don't read
translation.zh:
‎这个就会说 ‎他们绝对不会读
‎简·奥斯汀和艾米莉·布朗特的书

translation.en: Jane Austen and Emily Brontë.
translation.zh:
‎他们绝对不会读
‎简·奥斯汀和艾米莉·布朗特的书

translation.en: -I have a thing for happy endings. -Skylar!
Oh, shit. Here we go. Um…
That is what I call a finish.
-Um… -Movie theater girl.
-Her name is Tessa. -How did you…
The blue eyes. Skylar went on and on about them.
Wow, Mom! Does anyone see a deep, dark hole I can crawl into?
translation.zh:
‎哇 妈妈 我… ‎有没有人看到一个黑洞
‎我可以钻进去的？

translation.en: [Leigh] He spent weeks searching for you on the Internet.
translation.zh: ‎他花了好几周在网上搜索你

translation.en: Mom…
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈
‎-他没找到你的半点信息

translation.en: [Leigh] He couldn't find a thing about you.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈
‎-他没找到你的半点信息 ‎我故意隐瞒自己的信息

translation.en: -Well, that is by design. -[phone ringing]
Told you. She's analog. Like me.
translation.zh: ‎跟你说过 她是老年人做派 跟我一样

translation.en: [sighs] Your father is driving me crazy.
translation.zh:
‎-你父亲把我逼疯了
‎-跟他聊聊

translation.en: Talk to him, Mom. Tell him-- Tell him I won.
translation.zh:
‎-你父亲把我逼疯了
‎-跟他聊聊 ‎-告诉他我赢了
‎-你以后可以自己跟他说

translation.en: No. You can talk to him yourself later.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉他我赢了
‎-你以后可以自己跟他说

translation.en: Are you going to be heading back to Edison tonight?
No, I'm gonna be staying at Grandpa Mike's. Um…
But first, I was gonna see if Tessa maybe wanted to go…
translation.zh: ‎但首先我想知道 ‎也许泰莎想要去…

translation.en: Chill out and hang?
[softly] Oh, my God.
Movie theater girl would love -to chill out and hang. -[Leigh chuckles]
-All right. Bye. -Thanks.
-[footsteps departing] -Thank you, Mom.
That's my mom. She does, uh, parties.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 那是我妈妈 ‎她很风趣

translation.en: I can put the top up if you want.
translation.zh: ‎你想的话我可以把顶棚盖起来

translation.en: [laughing] No, it's okay. It feels really good.
translation.zh: ‎不 没关系 感觉很好

translation.en: [sighs] You look amazing.
Say it in French.
You too.
You don't have a girlfriend, do you?
No. Not since the eighth grade. Why?
translation.zh:
‎没有 八年级以后就没有了
‎为什么问这个？

translation.en: This kinda looks like you.
[laughs] No. That is, uh… That's my mom and dad when they were teenagers.
Oh!
Yeah, this is actually the same Jeep that my grandpa bought my mom for her 18th birthday.
translation.zh:
‎这辆吉普我妈妈18岁生日时
‎我外公买给她的生日礼物

translation.en: You can actually see it behind them in the photo.
translation.zh: ‎那张照片就是买车后的合影

translation.en: Oh, yeah! They're so cute. They look so in love.
translation.zh:
‎哦 是啊 他们好可爱 ‎-他们看起来很相爱
‎-对 曾经很相爱

translation.en: -Yeah, they were. -"They were"?
translation.zh:
‎-他们看起来很相爱
‎-对 曾经很相爱 ‎-曾经？
‎-现在也相爱

translation.en: Are. They are.
My dad's just living and teaching in Oregon right now.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸现在在俄勒冈州生活和教书

translation.en: That's pretty far. Are they, like, taking a break or something?
translation.zh: ‎相距很远 他们在分居吗？

translation.en: No.
They're gonna be fine. They talk almost every day, so…
translation.zh:
‎他们会没事的
‎他们几乎每天都聊 所以…

translation.en: Some music.
-Whoa! -If you wanna take a look.
[gasps] What?
Yeah, it's my mom's entire high school playlist.
translation.zh: ‎这是我妈妈整个高中的歌单

translation.en: New Order. Kate Bush.
Echo and the Bunnymen. Your mom's like my new bestie.
translation.zh:
‎回音与兔人乐队
‎你妈妈就是我的新闺蜜

translation.en: -Your dad made her a mix tape? -Yes, he did.
translation.zh:
‎-你爸爸给她做的歌曲集锦？
‎-是的

translation.en: Can I play it?
-It's the other way. -[both chuckle]
-It's okay. I won't tell the '80s police. -Shut up.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我不会告诉80年代的警察 ‎闭嘴

translation.en: I have spent every summer of my life down here with my grandfather.
translation.zh: ‎我每年夏天都会来和外公一起过

translation.en: How have I never heard of this place?
translation.zh: ‎我每年夏天都会来和外公一起过 ‎我怎么没听说过这里？

translation.en: Well, that's my favorite part about taking photos.
translation.zh: ‎我拍照片最喜欢的就是这一点

translation.en: It's like you just stumble and wander and find places like this.
translation.zh: ‎你漫无目的地闲逛 发现这样的地方

translation.en: Right. But what… what drew you to this spot specifically?
translation.zh:
‎太好了 但是什么具体的原因
‎吸引你来这里？

translation.en: The view.
That view.
It was called The Empyrean.
It was a honeymooners' resort back in the '60s.
It's so surreal. It's unbelievable.
You've gone in there?
Unarmed?
I'll do anything for a great photo.
translation.zh: ‎为了拍出好照片 我什么都愿意做

translation.en: "Empyrean"? Um…
That's where Dante meets God, right?
translation.zh: ‎那是但丁遇见上帝的地方 对吧？

translation.en: Highest of all heavens. A place of pure love.
translation.zh: ‎天堂的最高处 纯爱之地

translation.en: Look at it. If that's not a metaphor for love, then I don't know what is.
translation.zh:
‎看看它 ‎如果这不是爱情的隐喻
‎我不知道是什么了

translation.en: Can I see your photos?
They're not on my phone. I don't shoot digital, remember?
translation.zh:
‎我手机上没有
‎我不拍数码照片 记得吗？

translation.en: Well, how do people see your work?
I don't show it, unless I have to for class.
translation.zh: ‎我一般不展示 除非课上有要求

translation.en: How come?
'Cause I'm not good enough yet.
I find that seriously difficult to believe.
Okay, so if you won't show me your photos,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 如果你不让我看你的照片

translation.en: -maybe give me a tour. -Of the Empyrean?
translation.zh:
‎也许你可以带我转转 ‎-去天庭？
‎-对 带我去

translation.en: Yeah, show it to me.
I wanna see it, you know, through your eyes.
translation.zh: ‎我想去看看 你知道 透过你的双眼

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we all have wings ♪
Do you know how to waltz?
-Not at all. -Okay, just step back this way.
-Okay. -And then your back foot forward.
And then it's like one, two, three. Straighten your leg.
translation.zh: ‎然后就是一、二、三 所以你就一

translation.en: One, two, three.
Okay.
And then you have to put your chin up and then lead.
translation.zh: ‎然后你要抬起下巴 微微的

translation.en: Like you don't want to pay any attention to the other person. -Don't slip. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: ‎好像你不关注对方 随便吧

translation.en: Do you want to see what it's like to be inside of a camera?
translation.zh:
‎你想看看在照相机里面
‎是什么感觉吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay. Close the door.
It works just like a camera lens. I kind of made it myself.
translation.zh: ‎这就像是照相机镜头 我自己做的

translation.en: Whoa.
It's beautiful.
Yeah.
I mean, it's pretty good, right?
Ooh, I mean, it's obvious you just haven't been playing that long.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 很明显你会吹没有多久

translation.en: -Just three years. -Oh.
Should have heard me back then.
translation.zh: ‎你应该听听我当年怎么吹的

translation.en: Can you hear them?
Hear who?
The ghosts of newlyweds past.
No. What are they saying?
Well, the groom, he's saying…
[in deep voice] Come on, honey.
You've been in the bathroom for two hours now.
translation.zh: ‎“你在洗手间待了两个小时了”

translation.en: It's time to come to bed. You're my wife.
What does the bride say?
Well, the bride is saying, um…
But you haven't even kissed me yet.
-Okay. -You want me to walk you to your door
so your parents don't think I'm a… taxidermist?
translation.zh:
‎这样你父母不会以为
‎我是动物标本剥皮师？

translation.en: What?
Or like someone-- a serial killer?
That's okay. Um, they're not my parents, actually.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 其实他们不是我的父母

translation.en: I, uh… I'm just a genetic stranger that lives under their roof.
translation.zh:
‎我只是一个熟悉的陌生人
‎跟他们住在一起

translation.en: "A genetic stranger"?
Yeah, it's, uh… It's a long story.
For another time.
When can I see you again?
Um, well, when are you back in Avalon?
End of the month. And how long are you gonna be here for?
The whole summer.
I'm staying with my grandpa until I leave for Brown.
translation.zh:
‎我跟我外公住一阵
‎然后去布朗大学读书

translation.en: You're going to Brown? What?
I just kissed an Ivy League bro?
-[gasps] -[laughs] Your street cred ruined?
translation.zh: ‎有辱你街头大姐大的名声吗？

translation.en: Only if you tell me that you're also a lifeguard.
Yeah.
-Are you serious? -Mm-hmm.
About three summers now at Washington Avenue Beach.
translation.zh:
‎在华盛顿大道海滩
‎当过大概三个夏天的救生员

translation.en: No! Why?
-Good night. -Good night.
Do I need to kick this guy's ass?
No, she's just scared.
Because she likes him.
[Vickie] Tessa?
Shannon's waiting.
Okay, I'm coming.
Hey, what's that?
That is four A's, one A-minus. Don't want to talk about it.
translation.zh: ‎得了四个A和一个A减的奖品 不想聊

translation.en: I'm gonna tint the windows, so no one knows it's me inside.
translation.zh:
‎我打算把车窗搞成黑色
‎这样就没人知道我在里面

translation.en: Geez, stop whining. It's a car.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 别再抱怨了 一辆车而已

translation.en: So did you call the phone company?
-Yeah. -And?
You were right.
They just said that Skylar probably sent the photo before the accident
translation.zh:
‎他们说斯凯勒
‎可能在车祸前发送了那张照片 ‎然后照片就卡在服务器什么的当中了

translation.en: and then it got stuck in the server or something.
translation.zh: ‎然后照片就卡在服务器什么的当中了

translation.en: But that doesn't explain why my phone just turned on after it was completely trashed.
translation.zh:
‎但这并不能解释
‎为什么我的手机完全被撞坏了 ‎还能开机 你能解释一下吗？

translation.en: Can you explain that?
translation.zh: ‎还能开机 你能解释一下吗？

translation.en: I can't. No.
Hey.
It's totally normal to read into things.
My mom did the same thing after her sister died.
translation.zh: ‎我姨妈死的时候我妈也这样

translation.en: Every rainbow was a sign.
translation.zh: ‎出现每道彩虹好像都有含义

translation.en: Every butterfly was a message from heaven.
translation.zh: ‎每只蝴蝶都是天堂传来的信息

translation.en: Meet my computer on wheels.
[Shannon] Shit.
Sorry. You put it on my Spotify.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 ‎你把它放到我的听歌应用里了

translation.en: It's okay.
Hey.
Talk to me, Tess.
I can't believe he's gone.
It's like I close my eyes
and I see us meeting for the first time.
translation.zh: ‎就看见我们第一次见面的景象

translation.en: And I remember every word that he said to me.
translation.zh: ‎我记得他对我说的每一个字

translation.en: I remember every expression on his face.
And then I open my eyes and it's like…
translation.zh: ‎然后我睁开双眼 就好像

translation.en: Did I, like, just dream our entire relationship up?
translation.zh:
‎然后我睁开双眼 就好像 ‎我们的关系都是我想象出来的吗？
‎他是我想象出来的吗？

translation.en: -Did I dream him up? -Hey. I was there.
translation.zh:
‎我们的关系都是我想象出来的吗？
‎他是我想象出来的吗？ ‎嘿 我也在现场
‎他不是想象的 好吗？

translation.en: He wasn't a dream, okay?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我也在现场
‎他不是想象的 好吗？

translation.en: Your head's just a little scrambled.
That happens when two tons of metal comes crashing into you.
translation.zh: ‎当两吨重的金属撞到你就会这样

translation.en: I don't even remember the last thing I said to him.
translation.zh: ‎我不记得最后对他说过什么

translation.en: -Come on. -I'm serious.
We were fighting that last week, remember?
translation.zh: ‎我们上周就为此吵过了 记得吗？

translation.en: Hey. You guys had an epic summer.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你们度过了一个美好的夏天

translation.en: -One that you will never forget. -Yeah.
Damn, I won't forget it, and I was just a jealous bystander.
translation.zh:
‎该死 我不会忘记
‎自己只是一个嫉妒的旁观者

translation.en: Oh, my God.
It's my first day back, and I look like a total mess.
translation.zh:
‎这是我第一天回学校
‎我看起来一团糟

translation.en: Yeah. You do.
-[laughing] -You do, yeah.
I heard about what happened, Tessa. I'm terribly sorry.
translation.zh: ‎你的事情我听说了 泰莎 节哀

translation.en: If you were my daughter, I'd tell you to use it.
translation.zh: ‎如果你是我女儿 我会叫你利用它

translation.en: Use it? The pain, the emptiness.
Channel it through your camera.
Some of the greatest works of art were produced by intense grief.
translation.zh:
‎一些最伟大的艺术作品都是在
‎强烈的悲伤中创造的

translation.en: -Okay. -Tessa.
RISD portfolio day is right around the corner.
translation.zh:
‎罗德岛设计学院的
‎作品预审日即将到来

translation.en: Thank you.
[Mel] So that's it?
You're just giving up your photography? It sure looks like it.
translation.zh:
‎-你放弃摄影了？
‎-看起来确实是这样

translation.en: This is the same crap your mom used to pull.
She'd become obsessed with things. Baking, yoga, pottery.
translation.zh: ‎她痴迷很多事情 烘焙、瑜伽、陶艺

translation.en: One day, lose interest, move on to the next.
translation.zh: ‎某天失去兴趣 又去寻找下一个东西

translation.en: That's why she could never get any traction in life.
translation.zh: ‎所以她一辈子都没有取得任何成功

translation.en: Are you done?
You think Skylar would have wanted this?
I don't know.
Why don't you go ask him?
I'm still here, Tess.
Sky?
-[Vickie] Tess? -I'm sleeping.
I just did a double shift. You were asleep when I left.
translation.zh: ‎我走的时候你就在睡 我都值两班了

translation.en: Did you even eat anything?
I'm not hungry.
Can you please just let me sleep?
No. No, no, no, no! No, no, no, no…
No, no, no. No, no…
Hi.
-Tessa? -Uh, I gotta talk to Doris.
translation.zh:
‎泰莎？ ‎-我得跟桃丽丝谈谈
‎-等一下

translation.en: Hang on a second. Let me-- Wait, Tessa.
translation.zh:
‎-我得跟桃丽丝谈谈
‎-等一下 ‎让我…等等 泰莎

translation.en: What-- Her family took her home this morning.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么…
‎-她的家人今早接她回家了

translation.en: There was nothing more we could do. Are you okay, honey?
translation.zh:
‎我们已经无能为力了
‎你还好吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Um, I just haven't-- I haven't eaten today.
-Um-- -You know what, let me check you out.
-Why do you need to talk to Doris so bad? -It's just--
translation.zh:
‎你为什么要找桃丽丝聊聊？ ‎跟她之前跟我谈过的事有关
‎关于来世的

translation.en: It's about what she was telling me before. It's about the afterlife.
translation.zh:
‎跟她之前跟我谈过的事有关
‎关于来世的

translation.en: Maybe that old coot isn't so crazy after all.
translation.zh: ‎也许那个疯婆子其实一点也不疯

translation.en: What do you mean? Your heartbeat is fast, but it sounds healthy.
translation.zh:
‎-什么意思？
‎-你的心跳很快但很健康

translation.en: Wait, what do you-- What were you saying? What do you mean?
translation.zh:
‎什么？等等
‎你刚才说什么？什么意思？

translation.en: Doris told me you'd come looking for her.
She even left you something.
Her book.
Tessa, I have seen a lot of dying and grieving in my time here.
translation.zh: ‎泰莎 我在这里看过很多死亡和悲伤

translation.en: Looking back never helped anyone.
translation.zh: ‎沉迷于过去对任何人都没帮助

translation.en: There's either life or there's death.
There's no place in-between.
I'm gonna find him.
[Doris on video] What does the in-between look like?
Well, we as living beings can never imagine it. We have no reference.
translation.zh: ‎如果没有参照 ‎我们作为活人是无法想象的

translation.en: It would be like trying to describe a sunset to a blind man.
translation.zh: ‎这就好像跟盲人描述日落的样子

translation.en: Technological advances have made ghost-hunting a legitimate field.
translation.zh: ‎技术的进步让捉鬼 ‎成为合理存在的领域 我的朋友达琳

translation.en: My friend Darlene, she let me borrow her full-spectrum digital camera.
translation.zh: ‎成为合理存在的领域 我的朋友达琳 ‎她把全光谱数码相机借给了我

translation.en: This baby can pick up light well beyond the human eye,
translation.zh: ‎这个小家伙能捕捉到 ‎人眼看不见的光

translation.en: with infrared night vision--
-[Shannon and Tessa laughing] -[thunder rumbling]
Well, happy Fourth of July.
I don't know. I actually kind of like this weather.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我有点喜欢这种天气

translation.en: Don't call me. So, you think this means the fireworks are canceled?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得这样烟花表演会取消吗？

translation.en: -I think so, yeah. -Yeah.
-Hey. -Hey.
-You okay? -Yeah.
Skylar, Tess says you're going to Brown.
translation.zh: ‎斯凯勒 泰丝说你要去布朗大学

translation.en: -Congrats! -Thank you.
What are you gonna study?
-Probably Latin. -That'll come in handy.
translation.zh: ‎哦 可能是拉丁文 ‎这个专业真实用

translation.en: You never know when you're gonna meet the Pope or something.
translation.zh: ‎你永远不知道什么时候会见到教皇

translation.en: Or need to conduct an exorcism.
Nice. That's nice.
translation.zh:
‎很好 谢谢 我不知道
‎我只是不想将来后悔

translation.en: I don't know. I just don't want to have any regrets, you know?
translation.zh:
‎很好 谢谢 我不知道
‎我只是不想将来后悔 ‎我想过不同的生活

translation.en: I wanna live a bunch of different lives.
What's the point of speaking languages if I'm not gonna travel the world and use them, you know?
translation.zh:
‎如果我不去旅行
‎会说多门语言有什么意义？

translation.en: Let's go.
We are going to watch the fireworks on TV.
translation.zh: ‎我们要去看电视上的 ‎烟花表演

translation.en: Do you want to talk about it?
Not really.
Okay.
My mom filed for divorce today.
I'm really sorry.
You know, I know this doesn't help right now, but…
translation.zh: ‎我知道我说这话毫无帮助 但是

translation.en: just because they're splitting up that doesn't mean that they don't care about each other.
translation.zh:
‎他们分开了
‎并不意味着他们不在乎你 他们…

translation.en: It means they've given up.
-I don't think that's fair. -Fair to who? You or them?
translation.zh: ‎那不公平 ‎对谁不公平？你还是他们？

translation.en: [sighs] When you're rowing a race and you get to the last 20 meters…
your entire body is telling you to stop.
translation.zh: ‎你的整个身体会叫你停下来

translation.en: Your muscles are on fire. Your lungs are screaming at you.
translation.zh:
‎你的肌肉火辣辣的
‎你的肺在对你尖叫

translation.en: Everything inside you wants to quit, make the pain go away.
translation.zh:
‎你的五脏六腑想要退出
‎让这种疼痛感消失

translation.en: But if you want to win,
that's exactly when you dig deeper and you row harder.
translation.zh:
‎那正是你将桨叶插得更深
‎划得更用力的时候

translation.en: You really don't like to let things go, do you?
-You noticed? -[laughs]
You're just starting to make me believe in happy endings.
translation.zh: ‎你开始让我相信大团圆结局了

translation.en: -Oh, no! The photo! No. -Oh, oh…
translation.zh:
‎哦 不 照片！ ‎-哦 不 完全毁了
‎-哦 不 怎么了？

translation.en: -What? -It's totally ruined. It's totally ruined.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 不 完全毁了
‎-哦 不 怎么了？ ‎完全毁了

translation.en: Now you see why I don't let anyone up here.
translation.zh:
‎现在你知道
‎为什么我不让任何人上来了

translation.en: I am pretty amazed that you've let me into your inner sanctum.
translation.zh: ‎我很惊讶你让我进了你的内部密室

translation.en: Yeah, well, if you tell anyone,
I'll poison you.
Oh, you don't have to…
-Hmm? -You don't have to look through that. -No, no, no. Okay. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 很烂 不 好吧
‎-嗯

translation.en: It's cool.
I like this one.
-That's, um-- -That's a cell phone tower.
-Yeah. -It's an allegory
for something-- technology co-opting our natural environment.
translation.zh: ‎某件事的讽喻 ‎技术与自然环境相融合

translation.en: Really?
Really.
I know you hate compliments, but this work is incredible.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你讨厌夸奖 ‎但这件作品真是太棒了

translation.en: I'm serious. It's like you can see things that no one else can.
translation.zh: ‎我是认真的 ‎我感觉你能看见别人看不见的东西

translation.en: That just shows how much you know about photography.
-I mean, I think you can sell this stuff. -Maybe on Etsy.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得这张你可以拿出去卖
‎-也许放到Etsy网上

translation.en: There is something that's missing
from like all of your photos.
Yeah, I know. It's color.
No. You.
I just don't really think the world needs another selfie.
translation.zh: ‎这个世界不需要多一张自拍了

translation.en: What is wrong with stepping in front of the camera every once in a while?
translation.zh: ‎别这样 站到 ‎照相机前会怎样？

translation.en: I believe that a photographer should point her lens outward,
translation.zh: ‎我认为摄影师应该把镜头朝外

translation.en: -toward the world. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
‎对着全世界 ‎-是吗？
‎-是的 所以你可以尝试去理解世界

translation.en: Yeah, so you can try and understand it.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-是的 所以你可以尝试去理解世界

translation.en: What about trying to understand yourself?
If you had my past, you wouldn't ask that question.
translation.zh:
‎如果你知道我的过去
‎你就不会说这种话

translation.en: You ever gonna tell me about it?
Come on. I'll walk you home.
I never met my real father. He ran off before I was born.
translation.zh:
‎我从没见过亲生父亲
‎我出生前他就跑了

translation.en: And my mom…
The kind way to describe her would be flaky.
-Wow. -Instead of counting sheep
translation.zh: ‎哇 ‎我小时候不是数着绵羊入睡

translation.en: to go to sleep when I was a kid,
translation.zh: ‎我小时候不是数着绵羊入睡

translation.en: I would count her fiancés.
And Mel was one of them?
Yeah, he was the last one.
Her final victim before she ghosted us for good.
translation.zh: ‎她永远消失前的最后一个受害者

translation.en: And that's when he took you in?
Well, he tried, but the court,
translation.zh:
‎他尽力了 但在法庭上
‎对一个想要收养

translation.en: they just didn't really look too kindly on a middle-aged bachelor
translation.zh:
‎他尽力了 但在法庭上
‎对一个想要收养 ‎年轻女孩的中年单身汉
‎他们真的看起来不太友好

translation.en: wanting to adopt a young girl.
translation.zh:
‎年轻女孩的中年单身汉
‎他们真的看起来不太友好

translation.en: So then where did you go?
Ah, Family Services. Foster care.
Oh.
You know how you said that I notice things that no one else does?
translation.zh:
‎你说过我能注意到
‎别人注意不到的事？

translation.en: When you live with strangers who can hurt you,
translation.zh: ‎当你和会伤害你的陌生人住在一起

translation.en: and I bounced around a lot,
you have to really just observe everything.
When you're a foster kid, you learn the hard way to…
translation.zh:
‎当你是一个被收养的孩子
‎你吃了苦头才认识到…

translation.en: Never put your guard down?
Yeah.
Anyway, about a year ago, Mel and Vickie got married
translation.zh: ‎大约一年前 梅尔和薇琪结婚了

translation.en: and then the court let them take me in.
So that's why you call yourself a genetic stranger?
translation.zh: ‎所以你说自己是熟悉的陌生人

translation.en: -I did that. -[scoffs]
♪ She knows that I'm through with that ♪
translation.zh:
‎（想象你在罗德岛设计学院的未来
‎大一新生）

translation.en: ♪ True and kind ♪
♪ And I will be fine with that… ♪
[Vickie] Good God.
-How early is it? -Super early.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 今天这么早？ ‎非常早

translation.en: A little splash of almond milk, right?
Uh, yeah.
I like your necklace. Yeah? Shannon lent it to me.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢你的项链
‎-是吗？莎伦借给我的

translation.en: You know, if you ever want to borrow anything from me,
clothes or makeup, jewelry…
All righty.
I'll see you later, Vick.
See ya.
When a rower dies, this is what heaven looks like.
translation.zh: ‎赛艇运动员死后 这就是天堂的样子

translation.en: For me, heaven is Paris in the rain. Like cobblestone streets.
translation.zh:
‎对我来说 天堂就是雨中的巴黎 ‎-鹅卵石街道
‎-是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah. Is everything in black and white?
Get out of my head.
You ever been? To Paris?
Someday.
Avec moi?
I guess I could use a translator.
My parents had their honeymoon there.
translation.zh: ‎我父母度蜜月就是去的巴黎

translation.en: So I've been saving up to send them for their 25th anniversary.
translation.zh:
‎所以我一直在存钱
‎送他们去庆祝25周年纪念日

translation.en: -What if they don't want to go? -I mean, who doesn't want to go to Paris?
translation.zh: ‎如果他们不想去呢？ ‎谁会不想去巴黎？

translation.en: Yeah, but what if they don't want to go with each other?
It's not a crime to fall out of love, you know.
-Tessa. -Hmm? Love never dies.
What?
You just sound like someone who's never been hurt by life.
translation.zh:
‎听你这么说
‎你好像一辈子没被生活伤害过

translation.en: You putting me on notice?
[laughs] No.
Um, what the hell is that?
This… is a rowboat.
I'm assuming you want me to get in that?
-You are getting in this with me. -No.
We spent four hours in your darkroom doing what you love to do.
translation.zh:
‎我们在你的暗房里待了四个小时
‎做你喜欢做的事

translation.en: Let me show you what I love to do.
translation.zh: ‎让我向你展示一下我喜欢的事

translation.en: -[Tessa] Hands under your… -[Skylar] Thumbs here.
translation.zh:
‎-手放在这个下面
‎-拇指在这里

translation.en: [Tessa] Thumbs there.
translation.zh:
‎-拇指在这里
‎-然后它会变成这样

translation.en: [Skylar] And then it's gonna go simple like that. You press it down.
translation.zh:
‎-拇指在这里
‎-然后它会变成这样 ‎-按下去
‎-好

translation.en: Okay.
And then you tilt it and then you pull it.
-Hmm. -And then you're pressing down,
tilt it, and then pull it.
-Okay, I'm gonna try and go forward again. -All right. -Don't help me. -I won't.
translation.zh: ‎好的 我试着让船再次前进 别帮我

translation.en: I won't. You've got this. You've got this.
translation.zh: ‎我不会的 别担心 你可以的 ‎你可以的

translation.en: [Tessa] Oh, my God! -This is awful. -[Skylar laughs]
-Oh, I'm tired now. -You're flying!
I love you, Tessa.
We should probably head back, yeah?
Hey.
"The in-between"?
That's just what Doris calls it,
but every culture has their own version of it.
translation.zh: ‎但每个文化都有不同的说法 所以…

translation.en: So, it's where we go after we die.
translation.zh: ‎但每个文化都有不同的说法 所以… ‎我们死了会去那个地方

translation.en: Not me. I'm going to Jamaica.
I'm serious, Shannon. It's like a waiting room for our souls.
translation.zh:
‎我是认真的 莎伦
‎它就像是我们灵魂的等候室

translation.en: Okay, so you think Skylar is reaching out to you from this waiting room?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 所以你觉得斯凯勒
‎正在那个等待室里联系你

translation.en: They were color photos, Shannon. I don't… I don't shoot in color.
translation.zh:
‎它们是彩色照片 莎伦
‎我不拍彩色照片

translation.en: I don't even own the chemicals to develop it.
translation.zh: ‎我都没有冲洗彩照的化学药剂

translation.en: -But you can't show me the photos? -No, I told you.
translation.zh:
‎你不能给我看看照片吗？ ‎不能 我告诉过你了 定影液没用
‎我不知道为什么

translation.en: The fixer didn't work. I don't know why.
translation.zh:
‎不能 我告诉过你了 定影液没用
‎我不知道为什么

translation.en: But maybe spirits can't be captured on film or something. I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎但也许胶片捕捉不到灵魂 ‎我不知道

translation.en: All right.
Tess, I want to believe you, I swear,
translation.zh: ‎泰丝 我想相信你 我发誓 但是

translation.en: but messages from the other side?
I just think he wants the same thing I want.
To see me one last time so that we can actually say goodbye to each other.
translation.zh:
‎想见我最后一面
‎这样我们能彼此好好告别

translation.en: You loved him, and he knew that.
What more is there to say?
[teacher] Two-minute warning.
Please take your seats and set your phones to silent mode.
translation.zh: ‎请坐好 把手机调成静音模式

translation.en: Dude, we need to focus, okay? You're not even listening to me.
translation.zh:
‎-我们需要集中注意力 好吗？
‎-你没在听我说话

translation.en: Yes, I am! I just don't think
translation.zh: ‎不 我听了 ‎我就是觉得这和彩照

translation.en: this is about color photos or waiting rooms or the in-between.
translation.zh: ‎我就是觉得这和彩照 ‎等待室或生死之间无关

translation.en: -Then what is it about? -A girl who won't let go.
translation.zh: ‎那和什么有关？ ‎一位不肯放手的女孩

translation.en: Just think about it. Okay?
Sorry.
Cell phone use is prohibited during the test!
Didn't I tell you the drive would be worth it?
translation.zh: ‎我不是跟你说过来一趟值得吗？

translation.en: This negative's made of glass. It's coated in collodion,
translation.zh:
‎这张照片用的是玻璃底片
‎上面涂了一层火棉胶

translation.en: then dipped in silver nitrate, which is crazy.
translation.zh:
‎然后浸在硝酸银里
‎这样做很疯狂 因为之后

translation.en: Because after that, you only have a few minutes to take the photo
translation.zh:
‎然后浸在硝酸银里
‎这样做很疯狂 因为之后 ‎你只有几分钟的时间用来拍照
‎否则化学药剂就会干掉

translation.en: or the chemicals completely dry up.
translation.zh:
‎你只有几分钟的时间用来拍照
‎否则化学药剂就会干掉

translation.en: Hmm. That's exactly what I was gonna say.
It's only ten grand.
It's a little out of my budget.
But I can offer you a gluten-free cracker with rotting cheese on it.
translation.zh: ‎但我可以给你一块无麸质饼干 ‎上面有腐臭奶酪

translation.en: You're so generous. It's crazy.
Sorry. Am I interrupting?
translation.zh:
‎-太疯狂了
‎-抱歉 我打断你们了吗？

translation.en: No. Julian, hi.
We were just talking about how much we love the photo.
translation.zh:
‎-我们都喜欢这张照片
‎-哦 是啊

translation.en: Oh, yeah. It's wonderful, isn't it?
I just love how he prioritizes mood and atmosphere over subject.
translation.zh:
‎我很喜欢他把情绪和氛围
‎置于主题之上的方式

translation.en: That is a very sophisticated insight for a girl your age.
translation.zh:
‎对于你这个年龄的女孩来说
‎这是非常成熟的见解

translation.en: Julian, meet my very sophisticated girlfriend.
translation.zh: ‎朱利安 见见我非常成熟的女朋友

translation.en: Hi, I'm Tessa. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我叫泰莎 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Congratulations on this. This is great. -Oh, thank you.
Okay, kids, follow me. I wanna show you something.
translation.zh: ‎好的 孩子们 跟我来 ‎我要给你们看样东西

translation.en: Doesn't it look amazing all lit up like this?
translation.zh:
‎这样看起来是不是很棒
‎像这样全部亮起来？

translation.en: -Like it belongs here? -It does belong here.
translation.zh: ‎好像它是属于这里的？ ‎对 它的确属于这里

translation.en: Tessa, you have an extraordinary eye.
I don't understand.
It's for sale for $1,000.
Yeah, and we already have two serious inquiries.
translation.zh: ‎对 我们已经接到两个认真的询价

translation.en: this photo is not for sale.
This was a gift to Skylar.
Can't you print another one?
I really don't want anyone looking at it. Can we please take it down?
translation.zh:
‎我不想让任何人看
‎我们能把它取下来吗？

translation.en: Are you serious?
-Take it down. -Hey, it's okay. I'll take it down.
translation.zh:
‎-拿下来
‎-好 我把它拿下来

translation.en: Thank you.
That's exactly why I brought you here,
to prove that your photos are great. Even Julian thinks so.
translation.zh: ‎证明你的照片很棒 ‎连朱利安都这么想

translation.en: I don't want this photo hanging on the wall of some random stranger.
translation.zh:
‎我不希望这张照片
‎挂在某个陌生人的墙上

translation.en: This is my photo.
That means I get to decide who I share it with and I shared it with you.
translation.zh: ‎我可以决定与谁分享 我和你分享

translation.en: You're right.
I'm sorry. I should have asked you first.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我应该先问你的意见

translation.en: I just wanted you to see how amazing you are.
And that you can get into RISD.
translation.zh: ‎你有资格就读罗德岛设计学院

translation.en: Who said anything about RISD?
translation.zh: ‎谁提过罗德岛设计学院的事了？

translation.en: Shannon said your art teacher thought you could get in.
translation.zh: ‎莎伦说你的美术老师认为你能被录取

translation.en: I'm gonna kill her.
It is the best art college in the country.
And it's in Providence, which is in the same city as Brown.
translation.zh:
‎而且它在普罗维登斯
‎布朗大学也在那里

translation.en: Which if you get in, we could be together.
translation.zh: ‎如果你被录取了 我们就能在一起

translation.en: -I-- -For real. Without a ticking clock.
translation.zh:
‎-我…
‎-说真的 不用匆匆忙忙的

translation.en: Even if I could get into RISD,
translation.zh: ‎就算我进了罗德岛设计学院

translation.en: which I totally doubt,
translation.zh: ‎我真的怀疑 我负担不起

translation.en: -I cannot afford that. -You're going to get into RISD.
translation.zh: ‎我真的怀疑 我负担不起 ‎你会被罗德岛设计学院录取

translation.en: -No. -And you could just get a scholarship.
Skylar, Jesus, just give it up.
translation.zh: ‎斯凯勒 天啊 放弃吧

translation.en: This is-- You can't fix everything.
What?
Your parents' marriage and me.
Some things are just beyond repair. Is that why you won't say you love me?
translation.zh:
‎-有些东西是无法修复的
‎-所以你才不说你爱我吗？

translation.en: Because you're… beyond repair.
That's…
-[machinery rattling] -[chattering on screen]
Hey, 8:00. I'm here like you asked. What's up?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 八点钟
‎我按你的要求来了 怎么了？

translation.en: I would like to take your portrait.
Uh… can I change first? No, you don't have to. You can just put that on.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 我可以先换衣服吗？
‎-不 你把那个穿上就好

translation.en: What's that?
It was my mom's.
This really brings me back to college.
I had a boyfriend who was an art major. Made me pose for him.
translation.zh: ‎我曾经有个艺术系的男朋友 ‎他要求我为他的创作摆姿势

translation.en: So… Mel isn't the first person that you've been in love with.
Gosh, no. I've loved a few men.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 不是 我之前爱过几个男人

translation.en: Maybe even one woman.
Did you love any of them more than they loved you?
translation.zh: ‎比起他们爱你 你有没有更爱他们？

translation.en: Oh, probably. Didn't that scare you?
translation.zh:
‎-哦 有可能
‎-那没有吓到你吗？

translation.en: Knowing that someone could hurt you more than you could hurt them?
translation.zh:
‎知道有人能伤害你
‎比你伤害他们更深？

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe at first.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 也许吧 刚开始

translation.en: But then I think I realized if you protect yourself from the lows,
translation.zh:
‎但然后我意识到
‎如果你保护自己免受伤害

translation.en: you just end up missing all the highs too.
translation.zh: ‎到最后你也失去了所有的欢乐

translation.en: You love Skylar. Don't you?
I think I'm screwing it up.
Yeah. If it's not opening old wounds, it's probably not true love.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 如果不揭开旧伤疤
‎那可能不是真爱

translation.en: I just don't know what to do.
How do I get Skylar to understand that…
I love him. [chuckles]
You start by saying it.
You need to hear the words, Tessa.
You mean, he needs to hear the words.
No. You need to hear yourself say them.
translation.zh: ‎不 你需要听到自己说这句话

translation.en: Out loud.
So the world knows your feelings count.
translation.zh: ‎让全世界知道你的感情是认真的

translation.en: That you count.
Vickie, I'm sorry.
For how I've treated you.
Hey, Google, dim the lights.
-Yes! -Oh, man. No smoke machine?
translation.zh:
‎-好啊
‎-天啊 没有烟雾机吗？

translation.en: We begin this invocation
by asking the Archangel Michael
translation.zh: ‎我们先请求大天使米迦勒保护我们

translation.en: to protect us from any malevolent spirits that may be seeking a gateway into this earthbound sphere.
translation.zh:
‎不受任何正在寻找
‎阳间入口的恶灵的伤害

translation.en: You wrote this?
-You're interrupting my invocation. -I'm sorry!
It's just-- This is crazy. Did you read all of these books in two days?
translation.zh:
‎太疯狂了
‎你在两天内读完了这些书？

translation.en: Bitch, yes! You know speed reading is my super power.
translation.zh:
‎姐妹 是的
‎你知道快速阅读是我的超能力

translation.en: Enjoy Your Own Funeral.
Yeah. That happens to be a classic
translation.zh:
‎是啊 ‎它恰好是
‎超自然形而上学流派的经典之作

translation.en: of the paranormal metaphysical genre.
translation.zh:
‎它恰好是
‎超自然形而上学流派的经典之作

translation.en: -Now hush. -Okay.
We seek to communicate
translation.zh:
‎我们只想与生前
‎叫做斯凯勒·亚当斯的灵魂

translation.en: only with the disembodied spirit formerly known as Skylar Adams.
translation.zh:
‎我们只想与生前
‎叫做斯凯勒·亚当斯的灵魂 ‎进行沟通

translation.en: No other spirits, please.
Okay.
-A Ouija board? -Please, Tess. This is a planchette.
translation.zh:
‎-通灵板？
‎-拜托 泰丝 ‎这是占卜板

translation.en: There's a pencil tip attached to the bottom.
We ask questions and Skylar communicates by moving our hands.
translation.zh:
‎我们问问题 斯凯勒移动我们的手
‎跟我们沟通

translation.en: Just like he did in the gym. Here. Fingers right there.
translation.zh:
‎就像考试时候那样
‎这里 手指放这里

translation.en: Okay. Close your eyes.
-[gasps] Oh, my God, it moved. -Sorry. That was me. My bad.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 它动了 ‎抱歉 那是我 我的错

translation.en: It's called scrying. The deceased use the mirror
translation.zh: ‎这叫镜子占卜 ‎死者把镜子当作通向活人世界的入口

translation.en: as a gateway to the world of the living.
translation.zh: ‎死者把镜子当作通向活人世界的入口

translation.en: All you have to do is stare into the mirror in a trance-like state.
translation.zh: ‎你只要用发呆地眼神盯着镜子

translation.en: -That's it. -Okay.
Yeah, I'm sorry. Can we cover up Gambino and Drake?
translation.zh:
‎嗯 对不起
‎我们能把甘比诺和德雷克盖上吗？

translation.en: They're like really distracting me.
Instrumental Trans-Communication.
The spirit uses the TV monitor as a bridge to our world.
translation.zh:
‎灵魂用电视屏幕
‎作为通往我们世界的桥梁

translation.en: -What is this? Okay. -Here you go.
Blocks out the gamma rays.
Do you see anything? No. Do you?
translation.zh:
‎-你看到什么了吗？
‎-没有 你呢？

translation.en: No.
Maybe I should have read more books.
No. No, you've been awesome.
[sighs] Oh, man. It's just Vickie.
Needs the car. She has a shift.
Okay. I'll walk you out.
Okay.
-[electric warbling] -[voice murmuring]
Hello?
[GPS] Your route is being calculated.
Proceed for four miles to the entrance to Highway 85 South.
translation.zh:
‎继续前进6.4公里
‎到达85号高速路南线入口

translation.en: -It's a map. -[door opens, closes]
Tessa? Tessa!
Sorry! I've gotta do this.
Tessa!
[GPS] Head southwest to I-95 South and proceed for 106 miles.
translation.zh:
‎往西南方向驶入95号州际公路
‎然后继续行驶170公里

translation.en: Continue straight for six miles.
[GPS] Take the next right, and in 100 feet,
translation.zh: ‎在下一个路口左转 然后前进30米

translation.en: your destination will be on your right.
[GPS] You have arrived at your destination.
I told you he wasn't gone yet.
[laughs] Doris!
[chuckles] Come. Sit.
You know, I love coming out here at night to watch the shooting stars.
My angels are calling me home.
Skylar knows the end is near.
translation.zh: ‎斯凯勒知道马上就要结束了

translation.en: You don't have much time.
He's been communicating with you?
Well, I'm much closer to his world than you are.
What does he want?
My help.
To bring the two of you together.
Can you?
Please.
In ancient folklore, the souls of the departed
translation.zh: ‎在古代的民间传说中 ‎死者的灵魂会回到

translation.en: returned to places where they experienced their greatest moments of love.
translation.zh: ‎死者的灵魂会回到 ‎体验过最强烈爱意的地方

translation.en: That's where they were able to cross the life-death barrier.
translation.zh: ‎在那里他们能够跨越生死线

translation.en: Now, perhaps if you and Skylar went back
translation.zh: ‎现在有可能 ‎如果你和斯凯勒回到

translation.en: to where you felt the most love,
translation.zh: ‎你们感受过最强烈爱意的地方

translation.en: the window between worlds might open.
translation.zh: ‎生死世界之间的窗户可能会打开

translation.en: Okay.
But be careful.
If you do manage to cross the barrier…
translation.zh: ‎如果你真的跨越了那条界限

translation.en: there may be no way back.
-[hip-hop music playing over speakers] -[teenagers laughing, chattering]
Tess? What's up?
This is not how I wanted my summer to go.
Oh, no, what do you mean? What's wrong?
translation.zh: ‎哦 不 你什么意思？怎么了？

translation.en: They're so cute together, it's stupid. Who's cute?
translation.zh:
‎-他们在一起太可爱了 太蠢了
‎-谁可爱？

translation.en: -Oh. Is that Judd? -[Shannon] That's Judd.
-Oh… -My vagina is weeping.
They are cute, but I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎他们很可爱 但我很抱歉

translation.en: That's terrible. -Oh, my God! -What?
Billy Hodges came to my party?
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-比利·霍奇斯来我的派对？

translation.en: Ciao, Billy.
-Hey. -Hey.
[sighs] It's just three words.
Hi.
Can we go somewhere to talk for a second, alone?
-Sure. -[both chuckle]
-Yo, brutha! -Hey.
-[Cortez] I just heard the good news. -What news?
translation.zh:
‎-我刚听说了那个好消息
‎-什么消息？

translation.en: -Um… -Oregon State!
-Nothing's official yet. -Oh, bullshit, bro.
No, I just talked to the new coach. He said it's as good as done.
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 不会吧 我刚和新教练谈过 ‎他说已经定了

translation.en: Come on.
-Um… -Okay.
Tess? Tess? Tessa?
-Tess, I was gonna tell you, I swear. -When?
translation.zh: ‎泰莎 我本来打算告诉你的 我发誓 ‎什么时候？

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me? After I got into RISD? No, of course not.
translation.zh:
‎-我被罗德岛设计学院录取后吗？
‎-不是 当然不是

translation.en: I just didn't want to give you another reason to back out.
translation.zh: ‎我不想再给你一个退缩的理由

translation.en: What about our plan?
The same city? No more ticking clock?
translation.zh: ‎相同的城市 不会匆匆忙忙的

translation.en: You weren't even gonna send in an application.
I applied last week.
Well, thank you for waiting until the last possible moment to tell me.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你等到最后一刻告诉我

translation.en: The truth is, Tess, my dad's not…
translation.zh: ‎真相是 泰莎 我爸爸的情况…

translation.en: He's not doing that well.
He's really lonely in Oregon and I feel like I should stay with him for a while.
translation.zh: ‎他在俄勒冈州真的很孤单 ‎我觉得应该陪他一阵子

translation.en: Oregon is on the other side of the country.
-How were we ever gonna see each other? -It'll be hard.
I'm not switching schools permanently. I'm not!
And if you get into RISD, and you will,
translation.zh:
‎如果你进了罗德岛设计学院
‎你会进的

translation.en: I'll be in Providence before you are.
What happens if you start to like Oregon? What happens if your team starts to win?
translation.zh:
‎如果你开始喜欢俄勒冈
‎或你的队伍开始赢了呢？

translation.en: Tess, my dad needs me right now.
translation.zh: ‎泰丝 我爸爸现在需要我

translation.en: He's my family. I don't--
[exhales] You don't understand about family because--
translation.zh: ‎你不了解家庭的事 因为…

translation.en: Because I don't have one.
That is not what I meant to say.
I knew this was gonna happen.
I get close to people and they disappear on me.
translation.zh:
‎我与人亲近
‎他们就会从我的生活中消失

translation.en: This is just what happens to me.
-Tess. -No.
No.
You're just gonna push me away like you do everyone?
translation.zh: ‎你要把我当成其他人一样推开吗？

translation.en: The summer is over, Skylar.
And so are we.
Hey. Your ghost-hunting assistant has arrived.
Here you go. Direct from Daddy's closet.
translation.zh: ‎给你 直接从我爸的储藏室拿的

translation.en: Yeah, this is full spectrum, motion sensor, night vision.
translation.zh: ‎对 这是全光谱的 ‎运动传感器 夜视功能 完美 谢谢

translation.en: Perfect. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎运动传感器 夜视功能 完美 谢谢

translation.en: Who gave you all the swag? Ah, Vickie's credit card.
translation.zh:
‎-你这一身潮服哪里来的？
‎-薇琪的信用卡

translation.en: Whoa! Tessa's a bad, bad girl.
Bye.
Hey, if there are nudes of my mom on that camera, I do not want to know.
translation.zh:
‎如果那台相机里有我妈妈的裸照
‎我不想知道

translation.en: [whispers] Shh. I'm gonna tell you.
[officer] Central, standby.
You Tessa Benson?
I can't believe you tracked my phone.
translation.zh: ‎我不敢相信你追踪了我的手机

translation.en: The day you stole Vickie's credit card
translation.zh: ‎你偷走薇琪信用卡的那一刻

translation.en: was the day you gave up your right to privacy.
-What were you doing at the hotel so late? -I was taking photos.
translation.zh:
‎-你这么晚来这家酒店做什么？
‎-我在拍照

translation.en: I told you that. Are you trying to put yourself back in hospital?
I don't understand this. Things were so much better this summer.
translation.zh: ‎我不明白 今年夏天情况好多了

translation.en: -We started to feel like a family. -Do you not understand?
translation.zh:
‎-我们开始感觉像一家人了
‎-你不明白吗？

translation.en: Geez, I wonder what happened at the end of the summer that might change my mood.
translation.zh:
‎我想知道夏天结束时发生了什么事
‎也许跟我的心情改变有关

translation.en: Do you know what we've been through?
-Stop. -Love hurts. You learn to live with it.
translation.zh:
‎-别说了
‎-爱情伤人 ‎-你要学会去接受
‎-滚开 梅尔

translation.en: Fuck off, Mel.
translation.zh:
‎-你要学会去接受
‎-滚开 梅尔

translation.en: Hey, no! You don't get to talk to him like that.
translation.zh: ‎不 你不能这样跟他说话

translation.en: -Not after everything he's done for you. -There's no…
translation.zh:
‎他为你做了这么多 不能这样 ‎-不
‎-你太自私了…

translation.en: Tessa!
She's ruptured the repair.
translation.zh: ‎她心脏修补过的地方破裂了

translation.en: Is it any wonder? The way she's been running around all crazy.
translation.zh: ‎还有救吗？ ‎她那么疯狂地跑来跑去

translation.en: You can see right here
there is a fair amount of blood accumulated around her heart.
translation.zh: ‎她的心脏周围有大量的血液积聚

translation.en: -Will she be all right? -Not until we drain the chamber
translation.zh:
‎-她会没事吗？
‎-除非我们排空这个腔室

translation.en: and reinforce the original suture.
We're gonna schedule you for an OR first thing in the morning.
No, no, I-- I'm not-- You gotta let me go. You need to let me go.
-50 milligrams of Versed now. -[Tessa] Jasmine, no! Don't, please!
translation.zh:
‎-泰莎
‎-让我走 ‎-贾丝敏 不 你不要…
‎-泰莎

translation.en: Tessa, if I let you go home, you won't make it through the night.
translation.zh:
‎-贾丝敏 不 你不要…
‎-泰莎 ‎如果我让你回家 你撑不过今晚的

translation.en: You don't understand. You don't understand.
translation.zh: ‎你不明白 ‎好好休息吧 亲爱的

translation.en: -Get some rest now, honey. -I never got to tell… tell him.
Tell him what?
That…
They can never, ever tear us apart.
Tess? [groans] Shan, is that you?
Are you okay? You-- You sound medicated.
-I'm at the hospital. -What happened?
I saw him, Shan.
-No way. -At the hotel.
I couldn't touch him, but he was there.
translation.zh: ‎我触碰不到他 但他就在那里

translation.en: I just have one place left that I have to go.
-The lake. -Where he told you he loved you.
translation.zh: ‎那个湖 ‎他告诉你他爱你的地方

translation.en: I just don't really have much time left.
Okay, stay put. I'm coming.
Whoa.
-Now what? -I don't know.
-Room 22. -I'll take him.
-[chiming] -Oh. Ooh, two more.
-[chiming continues] -Witching hour. I'll take odds,
translation.zh:
‎见鬼了 ‎-我负责单数 你负责双数
‎-成交

translation.en: -you take evens. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我负责单数 你负责双数
‎-成交

translation.en: -Whoa. -Let's go.
I could get used to this.
-Go, go, go. -Come on.
Oh, God.
[Shannon] Whoa. What the hell?
The lake is that way. You've gotta turn around.
-I know. I know! -It's the wrong way! Please turn around.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道
‎-方向不对 ‎-转弯
‎-转不了

translation.en: -Let go. -What?
Let go!
I want a dead boyfriend too.
translation.zh: ‎我也想要一个死掉的男朋友

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Skylar says he's called you and left you a ton of messages.
translation.zh:
‎斯凯勒打你电话
‎给你留了无数条信息

translation.en: -So? -So? You're ghosting your soul mate?
translation.zh:
‎-所以呢？
‎-“所以呢”？你在躲你的灵魂伴侣？

translation.en: Shannon, my past is always just gonna get in the way.
Remember last year, you'd spotted that condemned bridge
translation.zh:
‎记得去年吗？
‎你注意到了那座废弃的桥

translation.en: and just had to get a photo.
You had to jump into the water,
even though it was freezing cold.
You know what I was thinking
translation.zh:
‎你知道我看见你
‎为了拍照片跳入水里

translation.en: when I saw you down there swimming against the current to get your photo?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我看见你
‎为了拍照片跳入水里  ‎逆流而上是怎么想的吗？

translation.en: "Imagine if Tess could be like this for her life, and not just for her art."
translation.zh:
‎想象一下如果泰丝不仅仅为了艺术
‎在现实中也能这样的话

translation.en: He's leaving tonight, Tess.
Lock up for me.
This is where the accident happened.
Do you know why he brought you here?
translation.zh: ‎你知道他为什么带你来这里吗？

translation.en: No. I don't know.
But I'm gonna find out.
Tess?
Tess!
Oh, my God.
I need help!
[dispatcher] 911, what's your emergency?
[Shannon] My friend just passed out. She has a heart condition.
translation.zh: ‎我朋友刚刚昏倒了 她有心脏病

translation.en: I'm at the corner of 6th and Channel. Please send somebody!
translation.zh:
‎我在第六街和隧道交界的地方
‎拜托派人过来

translation.en: [Tessa] Skylar!
Tess.
You forgot your hat. [chuckles]
I'm so sorry, Sky.
I'm sorry. I'm…
[sighs] I should have talked to you before making any decisions.
No. You shouldn't have to explain loving your family.
translation.zh: ‎不 关爱家人你无需解释

translation.en: If I hadn't spent my whole life just pushing everyone away,
translation.zh: ‎如果我这辈子没有把所有人赶走

translation.en: I would have understood that.
-No, come on, Tess. -I love you.
I said it.
Would you mind if I said it again?
I love you.
-[horn honking] -[Tessa screams]
-[Skylar] Hey. -[gasps]
-It's you. -It's me.
Oh, my God.
-I love you. -I know.
You told me. I love you.
So that's why you brought me here?
So that I'd know?
Yeah. No regrets.
So, is this…
Is this it? We're still in Avalon.
translation.zh: ‎就这样了吗？我们还在阿瓦隆？

translation.en: Not exactly. It's like everything you see is a memory,
translation.zh:
‎不完全是
‎你看见的所有一切都是回忆

translation.en: a dream that we have that's just projected onto the world.
translation.zh: ‎我们做的一个梦投射到这个世界中

translation.en: It's kinda cool.
Come on. I'll show you. Okay.
[Shannon] Wait, wait.
[speaking French] Oh, my God. It's incredible!
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 太不可思议了

translation.en: Wait a minute! I'm speaking English, but it's coming out as French.
translation.zh:
‎等等 我在说英语
‎但出来变成了法语

translation.en: [speaking French] Your pronunciation is not bad.
Can I tweak it a little? Be my guest.
translation.zh:
‎-我能稍微调整一下吗？
‎-请随意

translation.en: Aren't you forgetting something?
Can I really? Try it.
I bet you wish you had your camera.
translation.zh: ‎我敢说你一定希望手中有台相机

translation.en: Not even for a second.
I came out here the first day I met you.
translation.zh: ‎我认识你的第一天就来过这里

translation.en: My parents had just told me about the separation.
translation.zh: ‎我的父母跟我说了分居的事

translation.en: Felt like it was the worst day of my life.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得那是我人生中最糟糕的一天

translation.en: And then I met you.
And it was probably the best day of my life.
translation.zh: ‎那是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: Mine too.
[Dr. Sarkisian] There's nothing more we can do. She has a decision to make.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经无能为力 ‎她必须做出决定 她必须想要活下来

translation.en: She has to want to live.
translation.zh: ‎她必须做出决定 她必须想要活下来

translation.en: Come back, Tess. Come back, Tess…
What's wrong?
I've spent my whole life learning how not to get hurt.
translation.zh: ‎我一辈子都在学习如何不受伤害

translation.en: And that's no way to live.
But… But even with all the hurt that I feel right now…
translation.zh: ‎但即便我现在感觉到了伤痛…

translation.en: I don't regret a thing.
Because I love you.
And knowing that I'm capable of feeling this way
makes life worth living.
I don't want to say goodbye.
You don't have to.
Love never dies.
I'm gonna miss you.
[sobbing] I'm gonna miss you.
Go give us a happy ending, yeah?
translation.zh: ‎去让我们有个大团圆结局 好吗？

translation.en: Hey.
No more dying, okay?
Oh, my God. It smells so good.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 好香
‎-坐下 有很多

translation.en: -Sit down. There's plenty. -I can't. I gotta go.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 好香
‎-坐下 有很多 ‎不行 我得走了

translation.en: -Good luck, Tessa. -Love you.
-Go get 'em. -All right, bye.
See you later!
[Tessa] Ever since I was a little girl,
translation.zh: ‎从我小时候起 别人就一直告诉我

translation.en: people always told me that I see things that no one else does.
translation.zh: ‎从我小时候起 别人就一直告诉我 ‎我能看见别人看不见的东西

translation.en: It wasn't just that my camera was a way for me to express myself.
translation.zh: ‎不仅仅因为相机是我表达自己的方式

translation.en: It was the means by which I captured the unseen.
translation.zh: ‎它也是我捕捉看不见的东西的工具

translation.en: It was only recently that I discovered something that I had been blind to.
translation.zh:
‎直到最近我发现了
‎我一直熟视无睹的东西

translation.en: A ghost.
All of us, each and every one of us, are haunted by ghosts.
translation.zh: ‎我们所有人 每一个人都被鬼魂缠身

translation.en: The ghosts of childhood trauma.
The ghosts of unfulfilled dreams.
The ghosts of lost love.
Like so many people, I believed that if I just ignored these ghosts,
translation.zh:
‎就像很多人一样
‎我相信如果我不理这些鬼魂

translation.en: they would eventually go away.
This turned out to be a mistake.
Just like all of our worst fears,
translation.zh: ‎就像我们所有最深层的恐惧

translation.en: these invisible spirits gain strength in darkness.
translation.zh:
‎这些看不见的鬼魂
‎在黑暗中获得了力量

translation.en: If we run from them, they run faster.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们逃离它们
‎它们会加快速度追赶我们

translation.en: If we push them away, they just push back harder.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们把它们推开
‎它们会更用力地推回来

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
It has taken…
great personal loss
for me to discover the answer to this question.
We must attend to our ghosts.
We must welcome them into our lives
translation.zh: ‎我们必须欢迎它们进入我们的生活

translation.en: as though they are part of us, because they are part of us.
translation.zh:
‎好像它们是我们的一部分
‎因为它们就是我们的一部分

translation.en: It's only when we acknowledge their presence will they make room for new possibilities.
translation.zh:
‎只有我们承认它们的存在
‎它们才会为新的可能性腾出空间

translation.en: In the end, I've learned that our ghosts are part of who we are,
translation.zh:
‎最后我明白了
‎我们的鬼魂是我们的一部分

translation.en: part of who we hope to be.
translation.zh: ‎也是我们希望成为的一部分

translation.en: These hauntings stay inside us,
tethered to our hearts forever.
In life.
In death.
And… everywhere in-between.
